mapper.insert: insert into `case` (id, name, level, module_id, project_id, type, third_party, description, environment_ids, `system`, common_param, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{level}, #{moduleId}, #{projectId}, #{type}, #{thirdParty}, #{description}, #{environmentIds}, #{system}, #{commonParam}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.select: select case.id, case.num, case.name, case.level, case.module_id as moduleId, case.project_id, cm.name as moduleName, case.type, case.third_party, case.description, case.environment_ids, case.system, case.common_param, case.create_user, case.update_user, case.create_time, case.update_time from `case` left join case_module cm on cm.id = case.module_id where case.id = #{id}
